abstract: Figuring out the difference between what you need and what you want is one of the toughest challenges in personal finance.
snippet: Figuring out the difference between what you need and what you want is one of the toughest challenges in personal finance.
lead_paragraph: Carl Richards is a certified financial planner in Park City, Utah. His sketches are archived here on the Bucks blog and on his personal Web site, BehaviorGap.com.

headline.main: The Struggle to Define What We Truly Need
